dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: People think international assemblies are just talk, but actually, the TurkPA meeting in Kazakhstan just led to some pretty concrete steps for Turkic integration.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: People think international assemblies are just talk, but actually, the TurkPA meeting in Kazakhstan just led to some pretty concrete steps for Turkic integration.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President stated that Kazakhstan supports the initiatives of the Parliamentary Assembly and is ready to contribute to Turkic integration. Kazakhstan is one of the founding members of the Organization of Turkic States and considers it crucial for economic, cultural, and humanitarian development.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and President Tokayev mentioned that, um, they approved a unified writing system for the Turkic alphabet—that's a huge historical move for cultural unity.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and President Tokayev mentioned that, um, they approved a unified writing system for the Turkic alphabet-that's a huge historical move for cultural unity.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 5th World Nomad Games took place in Astana, and the unified writing system of the Turkic alphabet was approved " a significant historical step, added the Head of State.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and he brought up that during Kazakhstan's chairmanship last year, they held around 100 events under the 'Turktime' slogan. That's a lot of ground covered.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and he brought up that during Kazakhstan's chairmanship last year, they held around one hundred events under the 'Turktime' slogan. That's a lot of ground covered.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Last year, during our chairmanship under the slogan ˜Turktime', we held around 100 events that enhanced Turkic integration.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And now he's proposing the next summit be held in Turkistan, which, you know, feels symbolic, tying it back to deeper roots.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And now he's proposing the next summit be held in Turkistan, which, you know, feels symbolic, tying it back to deeper roots.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In this regard, I proposed holding the next summit in Turkistan, said the President.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But it's not just about symbolism—he emphasized the Turkic Investment Fund is already functioning, boosting economic ties.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But it's not just about symbolism-he emphasized the Turkic Investment Fund is already functioning, boosting economic ties.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Turkic Investment Fund is functioning effectively, contributing to Turkic integration.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And he linked all this to domestic reforms too, like Kazakhstan's shift to that 'Strong President – Influential Parliament' system. Pretty sweeping changes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he linked all this to domestic reforms too, like Kazakhstan's shift to that 'Strong President - Influential Parliament' system. Pretty sweeping changes.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a result of the referendum, Kazakhstan transitioned to a new system: ˜Strong President " Influential Parliament " Accountable Government.'

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, like district akims being directly elected for the first time, and 90% of maslikhat deputies in single-member districts. That's a big decentralization push.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, like district akims being directly elected for the first time, and ninety percent of maslikhat deputies in single-member districts. That's a big decentralization push.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For the first time, district akims are being elected directly by the people, and 90% of maslikhat deputies are elected in single-member districts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And he didn't shy away from the bigger vision either—calling it a 'Just Kazakhstan,' built on law and order, plus that 'Clean Kazakhstan' concept.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he didn't shy away from the bigger vision either-calling it a 'Just Kazakhstan,' built on law and order, plus that 'Clean Kazakhstan' concept.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Head of State named the ultimate goal as building a Just Kazakhstan, based on the principle of Law and Order. An integral part of this idea is the implementation of the 'Clean Kazakhstan' concept.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Which he says isn't just literal cleanliness, but more about renewing values and lifestyle, especially urging youth to step up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which he says isn't just literal cleanliness, but more about renewing values and lifestyle, especially urging youth to step up.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is not only about cleanliness, but about renewing our lifestyle and the values of our people. During meetings with the population, especially with the youth, I always say that the future of our country is in the hands of the younger generation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: You can tell he's really banking on the next generation—conscientious, open-minded, all that. It's interesting how he ties internal reform with external solidarity.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You can tell he's really banking on the next generation-conscientious, open-minded, all that. It's interesting how he ties internal reform with external solidarity.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Therefore, I urge the youth to be conscientious, intelligent, open-minded, secular, and responsible, said the President.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly—like domestic political changes give him more credibility when pushing for Turkic integration on the world stage.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly-like domestic political changes give him more credibility when pushing for Turkic integration on the world stage.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And you gotta admit, having that permanent representation now at the Organization of Turkic States? That's gonna make coordination way more effective.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And you gotta admit, having that permanent representation now at the Organization of Turkic States? That's gonna make coordination way more effective.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He recalled that a decision was made to appoint permanent representatives to the Organization of Turkic States, and that ties have expanded in the areas of trade and economy, energy, finance, and investment.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. It feels like they're building something lasting, not just holding occasional summits and calling it a day.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. It feels like they're building something lasting, not just holding occasional summits and calling it a day.
